summary:
Being very creative and crafty, I started building several objects using all kinds of materials in my childhood already. Due to my vocational training as a glass blower, I deepened my passion for materials processing, (analogue) 3D-modeling and inventing products as well as my understanding about glass. Driven by the fascination for this material, I became materials engineer and subsequently a materials scientist. Through my education, I gained deep knowledge about:

•	The nature, properties and possible applications of glass, ceramics, polymers, metals and compounds
•	Processing techniques, testing methods and characterization possibilities for glass, ceramics, polymers, metals and compounds
•	Coating techniques and methods to characterize layers and surfaces
•	Bio materials and recycling of materials
•	Computer aided 3D-modeling and 3D-printing
•	Quality control and statistics in experimentation
•	Documentation and presentation of results and scientific writing

During my Internships and employments as a R&D Engineer in materials development, I proved an outstanding attention to detail, a very good ability to visualize my ideas as well as very good teamwork, critical thinking, hands-on-mentality and problem solving skills.
I want to use my knowledge, experience and especially my high creative energy in additive manufacturing, toy production, packaging development, life sciences or similar industries.

education.field_of_study: Glass blower with specialization glass design

profile_positions.description:
o	Organized creative brainstorming and ideation events and promotional activities for knowledge sharing and technology exploration
o	Led transfer, set up, and qualification of a production line for a medical calibration device
o	Undergone extensive SixSigma training, including green belt qualification (ongoing)
o	Validation of medical characterization device
o	Orchestrated generation of life cycle assessment (LCA) of coating technologies
Led and performed characterization and assessment of various printing and coating technologies
o	performed failure analysis of ABS parts and led the creation of report and work instructions
o	Delivered extensive literature research about internal coating activities and created a summary as quick guide
o	Led and supervised the installation, deployment, and maintenance of a 3D-electronics printer
o	Led and contributed to the investigation of additively manufactured electronics (AME)
o	Operated, explored, maintained, and advertised 3D-electronics printer (NanoDimension Dragonfly IV system)
o	Established and optimized print job ordering and cost calculation workflow
o	Delivered comprehensive customer support and advice
o	Improved assurance of work and lab safety measures and special waste disposal according to regulations
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer - Molding Technology

profile_positions.description:
o	Successfully developed a jetable support material for 3D inkjet printing of optics
o	Identified base material for the development of jetable high-k material for EWOD-based Lab-on-Chip applications
o	Successfully produced glass fibre couplers from 7 fibres to one fibre with 7 channels
o	Fruitfully supervised national and international students
o	Documented and presented research results in a vivid and understandable way
o	Designed optics and demonstrators for 3D-printing of optics, as well as a widely accepted team mascot, which is also a demonstrator
profile_positions.title: Materials Scientist

profile_positions.description:
o	Designed and implemented a tool for the automatic generation of material data sheets  with zero costs
o	Optimized 3D-printing parameters for metal feedstock filament in FDM printers
o	Successfully monitored material quality control in the daily production of metal injection moulding parts
o	Managed the technical work packages of research projects by coordinating experiments with academic and industrial partners
o	Engaged in material development by producing feedstock and characterizing MIM parts at different points of the process chain
o	CAD construction and development of new products
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer
